content: War is Peace. Freedom is Slavery. Ignorance is Strength. Officially, this place doesn't exist. Try finding it on a map. Nope. Its like, off-the-grid. Spooky. You can locate it via photographs but that's about it. No one goes here and no one leaves. Right in our own neighborhood. I can assure you that its just not an institution that wants any kind of profile. It wants *your* profile; if anything. Otherwise, keep walking. Nothing to see here. Ride on. Costco's that way..

I can't actually provide a proper review. However, this is the Federal Metropolitan Detention Center. Many people may not know there is a federal prison so close by, but according to the Bureau of Prisons Website  this is an administrative facility capable of housing prisoners in all security levels, from violent offenders with possible high escape risk, to low risk security threats.
